name: Clown Pool
description:
Following the theme of “togetherness” we were inspired by Clown’s display of extreme togetherness when packing into tiny clown cars.

In Clownpool you have to fit as many clowns into the cars before the time runs out. Use your mouse to click and drag the clowns to the right position. Use the right mouse button to rotate them into the optimal position to maximise CPC (Clown Per Car).

Made for the ustwo games Game Jam 2021 - by Max, Matt and Oscar

Media used/referenced:

Song:

Julius Fucik March, "Entry of the Gladiators," Opus 68

Performed by United States Marine Band

Fonts used:

Circusia Regular by typotopia
